text: @Milbank Trump never said the Coronavirus was a hoax.I guess you didn't listen to the speech,I did,or maybe you have some trouble w/English language or self concentration when the speech is too long.The President took actions as soon as the beginning of January to be prepared in the US.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
